name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James R. FARREN, George Edward Hanson, Jr., Appellees

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
LARSEN, McDERMOTT and PAPADAKOS, JJ., dissent.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James R. FARREN, George Edward Hanson, Jr., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as improvidently granted.
LARSEN, McDERMOTT and PAPADAKOS, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Richard A. Hernán, Jr., Dist. Atty., Jury Trypupenko, Warren, for appellant.
Joseph A. Massa, Jr., Office of the Public Defender, Bonavita, Warren, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
516 A.2d 706
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James R. FARREN, George Edward Hanson, Jr., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 18, 1986.
Decided Nov. 6, 1986.
Richard A. Hernán, Jr., Dist. Atty., Jury Trypupenko, Warren, for appellant.
Joseph A. Massa, Jr., Office of the Public Defender, Bonavita, Warren, for appellees.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
